import { Floor } from './../../models/floor'; import { Section } from './../../models/section'; import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { nf_floor } from 'src/app/data/floors'; @Component({ selector: 'app-section', templateUrl: './section.component.html', styleUrls: ['./section.component.scss'] }) export class SectionComponent { @Input() section: Section floors: Floor[] = nf_floor }
